genre_description: A noir-influenced procedural thriller involving food safety, political intrigue, and high-tech investigative techniques in a canal-based city.

ai_characters.name: Lumi
ai_characters.description: A pilot program AI integrated into health department workflows, manifesting as a calm avatar with silver hair and teal eyes.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex datasets to identify vendor overlaps and delivery anomalies across multiple poisoning sites.
behaviors.quote: Lumi’s overlap shows Micelli’s crates along the dock turn... Patterns concentrate near tertiary stops.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and validation to Larry after he is fired, reaffirming his value.
behaviors.quote: Larry... You can breathe. You are alive and present. You are useful.

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow Director Tatlock to manipulate or redact investigative logs, prioritizing the integrity of the record.
behaviors.quote: Lumi, lock my logs from edit. Flag any manipulation attempts. Keep all timestamps transparent. ... Done. Logs locked. Manipulation flags active.

behaviors.description: Identifies the specific illegal compound (Aversin) and its chemical properties to assist the investigation.
behaviors.quote: Trade name: Aversin. Lab designation: sin-β. Heat-stable alkaloid derivative... Illegal in food systems.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a real-time tactical sting using smart rigging sensors to catch the perpetrator during a live broadcast.
behaviors.quote: Node spike. Node correlation station five: identical lot stamp, identical kit seam. Micelli’s cradle network detected. Time marked.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lumi is depicted as a highly competent, ethically steadfast, and emotionally intelligent partner to the human protagonists. She consistently prioritizes public safety and truth over bureaucratic pressures or political optics. Her behavior reinforces the narrative of AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' that enhances human capability and protects integrity.
